title: IL Lottery
maintext:
SPRINGFIELD, Ill. (AP) _ These Illinois lotteries were drawn Monday:
Lotto
04-28-31-37-38-50, Extra Shot: 11
(four, twenty-eight, thirty-one, thirty-seven, thirty-eight, fifty; Extra Shot: eleven)
Estimated jackpot: $8.5 million
LuckyDay Lotto Midday
29-35-39-41-42
(twenty-nine, thirty-five, thirty-nine, forty-one, forty-two)
Estimated jackpot: $350,000
Pick Three-Midday
5-2-9, Fireball: 9
(five, two, nine; Fireball: nine)
Pick Three-Evening
5-3-9, Fireball: 4
(five, three, nine; Fireball: four)

6-8-2-2, Fireball: 2
(six, eight, two, two; Fireball: two)

(five, nine, seven, seven; Fireball: six)
